name: Cleanup of the Black Lagoon - LD33 Entry
name_original: Cleanup of the Black Lagoon - LD33 Entry
description:
A simple arcade game. Spit the rubbish out of your lagoon before the humans mess it all up!

Made for Ludem Dare 33 ("You are the monster") in 72 hours.

Made as a member of Culturebosh! Games with artist Shaun McHugh.

It's got strange controls, WASD to move. "L" key to eat and spit!

Sorry, it's too old to export a good HTML 5 version, so it's windows download only!
